## Token Request

### Category
Which category does this token belong to?
- [ ] Color
- [ ] Spacing

- [ ] Border (border-radius, border-width)

### Proposed Token Name

`--proposed-token-name`

### Proposed Value

```css
--proposed-token-name: value; /* Description */
```

For colors:
```css
--color-name: light-dark(#lightValue, #darkValue);
```
